prod_short_desc: Build your own holiday season fun with Santa and his sleigh!
prod_long_desc:
Bring some LEGO® DUPLO® holiday magic to your toddler, as they fly Santa around in his sleigh. Young children will love landing the sleigh to meet the 2 child DUPLO figures for some festive fun down the sledging slope. Help build the slope, the fir tree and snowman to develop early construction skills. Includes 3 DUPLO figures plus 2 animal figures.
Build Santa’s sleigh and create some holiday magic!
Includes 3 LEO DUPOLO figures: Santa, 2 children, plus a reindeer and a squirrel
LEGO DUPLO building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Santa's sleigh with reindeer measures over 4” high, 9” long and 2” wide. Slope measures over 2” high, 7” wide and 3” long. Tree measures over 6” high, 5” wide and 3” long. Snowman measures over 3” high, 2” wide and 1” long
45 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5
